response.overview: When Sosuke, a young boy who lives on a clifftop overlooking the sea, rescues a stranded goldfish named Ponyo, he discovers more than he bargained for. Ponyo is a curious, energetic young creature who yearns to be human, but even as she causes chaos around the house, her father, a powerful sorcerer, schemes to return Ponyo to the sea.
response.tagline: Welcome to a world where anything is possible.
response.title: Ponyo

titles.title: Ponyo on the Cliff by the Sea
Ponyo y el secreto de la sirenita
